name: YouTube - Hide Annotations
description: A quick, lightweight solution for people who generally don't want annotations but also don't want to install a whole new addon or give YouTube permission to remember who they are. (Easy to temporarily disable using the Stylish button menu on those rare occasions when you do want annotations.)

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info: 2016-11-13: Also hide the "teaser cards" in the top-right corner of some videos.
